org.apache.jmeter.protocol.tcp.sampler

Class BinaryTCPClientImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.jmeter.protocol.tcp.sampler.AbstractTCPClient
      • org.apache.jmeter.protocol.tcp.sampler.BinaryTCPClientImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    TCPClient

    public class BinaryTCPClientImpl
extends AbstractTCPClient
    TCPClient implementation. Reads data until the defined EOM byte is reached. If there is no EOM byte defined, then reads until the end of the stream is reached. The EOM byte is defined by the property "tcp.BinaryTCPClient.eomByte".

    Input/Output strings are passed as hex-encoded binary strings.

    • Field Summary

      • read

        public String read(InputStream is,
                   SampleResult sampleResult)
            throws ReadException
        Reads data until the defined EOM byte is reached. If there is no EOM byte defined, then reads until the end of the stream is reached. Response data is converted to hex-encoded binary
        Specified by:

        Throws:
        ReadException - when reading fails
